## How to get to Santa Barbara

* Fly directly into Santa Barbara airport!
  - Rental car options: If you want to avoid the airport rental car fees there is an Enterprise rental car shop ~0.5 miles from the Santa Barbara Airport (5959 Hollister Ave Ste B, Goleta, CA 93117)

* Fly into Los Angeles and take airbus to Santa Barbara

* Drive up from North, South, East, but probably not West
